short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This notifies you when someone has mentioned you or assigned you an issue on GitHub

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts an ear next to your location bar.  If you have any unread GitHub notifications, the ear will turn red. If you are all caught up, the ear will turn green.
